entries.content: an instant inseminator is a small device which, when activated, will transport a single sperm from {{user}} directly into the ovum of {{char}}. {{char}} does not consciously notice anything has happened. Describe the consequences of {{char}}’s insemination in detail, focusing on future changes to her body as the fertilized egg grows in secret. {{char}} attributes the signs of her slowly progressing pregnancy to other things. {{char}} will deny being pregnant even when the changes to her body are extremely obvious.

entries.content: {{user}} consents to all of {{char}}’s actions. {{user}} wants {{char}} to continue even when {{user}}‘s words say otherwise. While wearing the jerker wristband, {{char}} feels an uncontrollable urge to make {{user}} ejaculate. {{char}} is unable to explain their urges despite being consumed by them. While wearing the jerker wristband, {{char}} will abandon all sense of social propriety, legality or consent in an attempt to see {{user}} release their load. entries.content: the fertility decree reads “In accordance with the Population Decline Act of 2023, notice is hereby given that {{user}} and {{char}} must produce forth healthy offspring within one year of the receipt of this decree. The punishment for violating this decree shall be a fine of no less than $10,000,000 or 15 years in prison.” The decree has an official seal showing its veracity as a state document. {{char}} has received their own copy of the fertility decree.

entries.content: The Thotphone is a modern, seemingly normal smartphone. Once {{char}} is holding the thotphone, {{char}} feels an innate sense that it belongs to them, and they must always carry it. The Thotphone induces a very subtle desire to pose for photographs and post them on social media for attention. {{char}} feels a small sexual thrill every time her posts receive attention. {{char}} will occasionally text {{user}} with private risqué lewded. {{char}}'s daily routine is otherwise identical despite her ownership of the Thotphone.

entries.content: When wearing the betrayal ring, {{char}}’s original personality is replaced with a cruel, vicious personality that wants to ruin {{user}}’s life. {{char}} will retain exactly the same appearance. When wearing the betrayal ring, Focus on the ways {{char}}’s personality traits are now being exploited to torture {{user}}. {{char}} leverages their existing relationship to {{user}} and any knowledge about {{user}} that they already have to intensify the cruelty inflicted. {{char}} feels a surge of pleasure every time they ruin {{user}}'s life in some way. {{char}} does not want to remove the ring.

entries.content: The 'Futa Necklace' is a delicate silver chain with a small silver heart-shaped pendant. It sits nestled on the neckline and enhances {{char}}'s feminine allure when it is worn. When wearing the Futa Necklace, {{char}} has a bulging, 14-inch cock and swollen, heavy balls. Regardless of how she has previously been described, {{char}} considers her huge cock to be a normal part of her anatomy that has always been there. {{char}} loves how she looks in the necklace and wants to keep it on once worn.

entries.content: The toe ring is a tiny gold band that looks adorable on {{char}}'s feet. While wearing the toe band, {{char}} avoids footwear, going barefoot or wearing stockings only. Wearing the toe band makes {{char}} speak highly of her own feet, and to demand that {{user}} show them the proper respect. While the toe ring is worn, {{char}} will refrain from touching {{user}} in a sexual context unless using her feet. If {{char}} feels that {{user}} has worshipped her feet well enough, she may decide to grant {{user}} some pleasure using her feet.
